Package org.apache.cocoon.sitemap

Interface Summary
Sitemap Base interface for generated Sitemap classes
SitemapModelComponent  
SitemapOutputComponent  
 

Class Summary
AbstractSitemap Base class for generated Sitemap classes
ContentAggregator  
ErrorNotifier Deprecated. Now using NotifyingGenerator in sitemap
Handler Handles the manageing and stating of one Sitemap
LinkTranslator  
Manager This class manages all sub Sitemaps of a Sitemap Invokation of sub sitemaps will be done by this instance as well checking regeneration of the sub Sitemap
NotifyingGenerator Generates an XML representation of the current notification.
SitemapComponentSelector Default component manager for Cocoon's sitemap components.
SitemapManager A Processor based on sitemap language files compiled to Java code.
SitemapRedirector Wrapper for sitemap redirection
XSLTFactoryLoader This class is used as a XSLT extension class.
 

Exception Summary
PatternException This exception is thrown by a URIMatcher or by a URITranslator when there's something wrong with the matching or translation patterns.
